title: Rick Pollick - Agile Program Manager
description: Jonathan is an energetic and motivated colleague. Jon has a passion for refining process frameworks which help both energize teams and communicate common goals. I have personally observed how quickly Jon has been able to integrate with various teams and make positive contributions. Jon also never seems to be out of good ideas. He is constantly thinking of ways to both remove barriers to progress and improve output quality. It has been impressive to see how Jon's ideas have had a positive impact on both teams and products. Jon's energy and knowledge will definitely continue to have a positive impact on the teams and individuals he works with.
